name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark Mode Plus - Smart Dark Mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy, smart way to enable dark mode on websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark Mode Plus is an easy way to turn most sites into dark mode. Dark Mode Plus uses a smart engine to make sure that turning pages from light to dark mode works great. Install it today, and improve your browsing!

If you have any feedback, you may share it here: https://tally.so/r/w2Le8b

Note: This extension is in beta. Dark Mode may not apply on all sites.

Update 1.1: Smarter dark mode detection and a user interface to toggle dark mode.
